title: Athletism — Grappling (Elite) — Phase 2: Work Capacity & Grip/Neck Base
equipment: Mat space (tatami, wrestling mats, grappling dummy)
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Grip tools (fat grips, gi pull‑up handles, towels)
goal: Enhance repeatability of grappling exchanges, build grip/neck resilience.

warmup: Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scap control)
Grappling flow drills: hip escapes, bridges, shrimps, rolls
main: Front Squat 5x5, Bench Pull 4x8, Hip Thrust 4x8
EMOM: sled push 20m / rope climbs x2 / sandbag carry 20m
